item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World Hello! My name is Miasto, I’m a security researcher based in Ireland. Currently my research areas are focused around Cyber Resilience, but I’ve previously done research on P2P Botnets and IoT malware, and different emerging threats. I’m an avid competitor in CTFs, representing team Ireland in the ECSC and WorldSkills. I regularly compete in online CTFs, mainly focusing in forensics, rev and misc. I plan to use this blog as a way to publicse any write ups and research, as well as to just get used to writting.
